A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If Rouge One was a love letter to fans\, The Last Jedi is revenge porn. The film makers tell fans what they think of our devotion for the past 40 years through Kylo Ren: Kill the past.  Ridiculous plot holes and not just a rejection of Star Wars canon but a repudiation.  Was the Star Wars jump the shark moment when Leia survived the vacuum of space and now uses the force?
